description:
### Document name - AWSConfigRemediation-DetachAndDeleteInternetGateway

## What does this document do?
This runbook detaches and deletes the internet gateway you specify using the [DetachInternetGateway](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_DetachInternetGateway.html) and [DeleteInternetGateway](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_DeleteInternetGateway.html) APIs.
If any Amazon EC2 instances in your virtual private cloud (VPC) have elastic IP addresses or public IPv4 addresses associated with them, the runbook fails.

## Input Parameters
* AutomationAssumeRole: (Required) The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that allows Systems Manager Automation to perform the actions on your behalf.
* InternetGatewayId: (Required) The ID of the internet gateway that you want to delete.

## Output Parameters
* DetachInternetGateway.Response: The boolean response from the DetachInternetGateway API.
* DeleteInternetGateway.Response: The boolean response from the DeleteInternetGateway API.

AutomationAssumeRole.description: (Required) The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that allows Systems Manager Automation to perform the actions on your behalf.

## GetVPCId
Gathers the VPC ID from the internet gateway ID.
## Outputs
* VpcId: Id of Amazon VPC.

mainSteps.name: DetachInternetGateway
mainSteps.description:
## DetachInternetGateway
Detaches the internet gateway ID from the VPC.
## Outputs
* Response: Returns True if the request succeeds, and an error otherwise.

mainSteps.name: DeleteInternetGateway
mainSteps.description:
## DeleteInternetGateway
Deletes the internet gateway.
## Outputs
* Response: Returns True if the request succeeds, and an error otherwise.
